item.description:
The Dwarves have stockpiled huge piles of gold high above in their mountain fortress. The Elves and Humans have caught wind of this tempting treasure. But they are no fool, they have erected giant walls and strong fortifications that will repel any invader that dares to poke their head in the Dwarven fortress. Will the invaders succeed or will the Dwarves have the last laugh?  Here we go! Anyone from 6 to adult is welcome at this high-energy 2 hour long sword fighting event.

Visit www.guardup.net to pre-register:   $15/member, $20/nonmember

Or Call ahead pre-registration (781) 270-4800: $17/member, $22/nonmember

At the door registration: $20/member, $25/nonmember
item.name: Buddy Night: Mountain Top
